title: Curry

properties.name: description
properties.value: Curry is a type of food that can be obtained by cooking uncooked curry on a fire or cooking range, requiring level 60 Cooking and granting 280 experience when successful. Players may burn the curry while cooking one, resulting in burnt curry; the burn rate while cooking these will decrease as players reach higher Cooking levels. It will stop burning entirely at Cooking level 74 on both ranges and fires. When eaten, curry heals 19 Hitpoints.

Item ID2011

Curry is a type of food that can be obtained by cooking uncooked curry on a fire or cooking range, requiring level 60 Cooking and granting 280 experience when successful. Players may burn the curry while cooking one, resulting in burnt curry; the burn rate while cooking these will decrease as players reach higher Cooking levels. It will stop burning entirely at Cooking level 74 on both ranges and fires. When eaten, curry heals 19 Hitpoints.

At 50 Construction, a Demon butler can be hired, who can serve curry in Player-owned houses. The number of curries served is equal to the number of people in the house, up to 10.

Curry is popular for fighting the Chaos Elemental or Chaos Fanatic because they heal a lot and when finished leave an item behind. An empty bowl prevents them from un-equipping Worn Equipment due to a full inventory.

Procedure[edit | edit source]

Steps
1. Add a potato to a bowl of water to make an incomplete stew
2. Add cooked meat or cooked chicken to the incomplete stew to make an uncooked stew
3. Add 1 spice or 3 curry leaves to the uncooked stew to make an uncooked curry
4. Cook the uncooked curry on a range to make a finished curry

Curry is popular for fighting the [[Chaos Elemental]] or [[Chaos Fanatic]] because they heal a lot and when finished leave an item behind.
